attributes.action: Make being in possession of date-rape drugs a crime of conspiracy to rape
attributes.additional_details: Currently, there are no consequences, relating to sexual assault, to being found in the possession of drugs only used to spike people i.e. flunitrazepam (Rohypnol), gamma-hydroxybutyric acid (GHB), gamma-butyrolactone (GBL). Being in possession of these drugs clearly indicates that the person is intending to date-rape someone in order to sexually assault them. We need better legislation to ensure consequences, reduce cases and prevent future incidents.
attributes.background: We need new legislation to protect us from being spiked by making being in possession of date-rate drugs a crime of conspiracy to rape. This conviction should equal time in prison. In turn, they should be added to the sex offenders register.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598421
